casebody.data:
Ludovicus N. KEYSER, a/k/a Ludo Keyzer
v.
AMERLINK, LTD. and Richard Spoor. No. 593P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2005. Barry Nakell, for Ludovicus N. Keyzer. Steven C. Lawrence, Fayetteville, for Amerlink & Spoor.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th day of October 2005 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st day of December 2005."
